description: This file declares functions related to sending IEEE 1905.1 messages and LLDP packets, specifically for forwarding raw 1905 packets, sending raw 1905 packets, and LLDP bridge discovery. It also includes declarations for obtaining TLVs from 1905 messages. The file contains header guards and includes other related header files.

methods.name: forward1905RawPacket
methods.description: Sends a '1905 packet' on a specified interface, forwarding a given CMDU with options for source MAC address handling.

methods.name: send1905RawPacket
methods.description: Sends a raw 1905 packet on a specified interface using the provided CMDU.

methods.name: sendLLDPBridgeDiscoveryPacket
methods.description: Sends an LLDP bridge discovery packet on the specified interface.

methods.name: obtainTLVFrom1905
methods.description: Fills a TLV structure with information extracted from local 1905 messages.
